item.title: Beocord 9000: Pulse Found...Beocord has life
item.description:
My examination of the Beocord power system continued with the regulator and power supply boards. The regulator board houses the +5 VDC and Â±15 VDC regulators, all situated on the large rear heatsink. I always inspect the heatsink compound and mica insulators for dryness, and thankfully, this Beocord appears to be in good condition. I’ve encountered instances where these components showed deterioration, but not in this case. With the regulator board cleared, I shifted focus to the power supply board’s voltages...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-9000-pulse-foundbeocord-has-life/
